title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 23 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 23 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Biden administration may be ready to call for a universal mask mandate. Governor DeSantis stands tough against mask mandates for kids. Jen the "Psaki Bomb" attacks him. What if the federal government ties funding to mask mandates? Being vaccinated has become a cultural signifier in blue cities. What will it take for families to push back against the ridiculous mask rules? Fiery callers -- some taking stands in their towns -- weigh in on new mask mandates.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
